Text: Tsmuxer and mux to blu-ray disk.
looks like fake, anybody knows what to do with this .iso?

burn with imgburn or mount in virtual cd.

you need windows xp with undf 2.5 or vista

Thanks for the reply!
You put me on the right track:
I had to find out that the burning wasn't the problem, but the reading of the burned disk. After installing UDF 2.5 driver now I can read the movie.
So it's NOT a fake :).
Any help on what to do with the ISO? I can't open it/mount it or do anything with it with power ISO or extract the files...

burn with imgburn or mount in virtual cd.

you need windows xp with udf 2.5 or vista
